Usage
=====

Below a number of usage examples are presented.

Standalone application
----------------------

The code below shows an example of creating a simple application which provides work areas for specified pages.

.. code-block:: python

	from selearea import get_ast
	from selearea import get_workarea
	
	webpages = {"http://fc.put.poznan.pl", 
    "http://fc.put.poznan.pl/rekrutacja/post-powanie-kwalifikacyjne%2C29.html",
    "http://fc.put.poznan.pl/o-wydziale/witamy%2C39.html"}
    
    ast_list = list()

    for page in webpages:
        ast = get_ast(page)
        ast_list.append( ast )
        
    workarea_list = get_workarea(ast_list)
